photos.title: Dam Reflection
photos.description: This is a view of a dam in Kleinmond. In this picture one can see the amazing view of the mountains and sky. The sky bounces off the water giving it a reflection effect. This is a peaceful and hidden place to have a swim.

photos.title: Jaguar E-Type 71'
photos.description: Jaguar E-Type next to a newly designed building with lots of colours that bring the image to life. The buildings in the background makes the car look extra special.

photos.title: Yellow Striped Frog
photos.description: This picture has a very detailed image of a frog. The frog is sitting on a lily enjoying the sun. One can see the water edging on the lily giving the picture more detail.

photos.title: Sun reflecting on water
photos.description: As the sun shines over the mountain there is a dark effect coming from the sun. This makes the picture look beautiful with a boat rowing in the background.

photos.title: Young married couple soul gazing
photos.description: This picture displays beautiful lighting with the sun shining over the mountain and water filling most of the image. This portrait has a bokah effect around the couple.

photos.title: Sun setting on mountain
photos.description: Sun setting on the mountain displaying exceptional colours on the horizon, aswell as refecting yellow/orange across the water.
